title: Desktop Pet DUCK
shortDescription: A desktop pet app published on the Microsoft Store with 95K views and 5K installs.
description: A beloved desktop companion app featuring an animated duck that lives on your screen. Built with tkinter and published to the Microsoft Store, it accumulated 95,000 views and 5,000 installs organically. Later rebuilt in C# with hunger, thirst, and feeding mechanics.
highlights: Rebuilt with advanced mechanics in C#
